description: COI all new redefined set of wallet look multiple chequebook holder and a classy looking memo pad which has colorful sticky notes along with a writing pad. The size of this Chequebook Holder when closed is ( L X B X H cm) 25 X 13 X 1 Card Slot - 2 , Document Pocket Holder Slot -2. This is Quirky And Useful Gift Perfect for Office/ Home Which Makes It a Must have. It is a Diary Style Desk Organizer,Memo Note Pad With A Closed Size Of ( L X B X H cm) 19.5 X 10 X 1.5. It Has 3 Sizes Of Sticky Note Pad & 1 Pas Of Loose Sheets With Clip Holder And A Pen. No. Of Sheets In Sticky Note Pad Of Yellow (Approx Size 10 X 7.5 Cms.) Pink (Approx Size 7.5 X 5 Cms.) Are 35 Approx . No. Of Small Strips / Flags (Approx Size 4.5 X 1 Cms.) Are 20 Approx. Each Colour And No Of Loose Sheets (Approx Size 17 X 10 Cms.) Are 50 Approx. It’s Perfect for travel and make personal notes etc. Fits well in handbags. Value for money , Smart and useful utility product
